entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
